imdb.plot outline: TV channel in the state of Buenos Aires with an innovative concept of community expression: everyone can access it for free and express their own ideas and opinions; it is a sort of television blog without thematic constraints. Therefore, for the first time the public is making television.
imdb.title: I say
plot: TV channel in the state of Buenos Aires with an innovative concept of community expression: everyone can access it for free and express their own ideas and opinions; it is a sort of television blog without thematic constraints. Therefore, for the first time the public is making television.
